review: i have been playing since 07 and It's better than ever before!i dont play via steam so this doesn't represent my many hours of play and trade.
PlanetSide 2 is one of SONY's greater games , open world free to play FPS with 3 different fractions fighting over control of the 'world' per say. Quite awesome for coop.
10/10 would charge ahead and clear 4 bad guys to save my fallen comrade '♥♥♥♥♥♥♥'
